DOC.brief_summary: This project examine effect incorporate modern wearable technology credit-based Physical Activity Instructional Program promote habitual level physical activity among college student .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Intervention Among College Students
DOC.detailed_description: This project cluster randomize trial examine effect utilize wearable activity tracker credit-based Physical Activity Instructional Program promote habitual level physical activity ( PA ) college student . The project conduct large public university locate mid-south region US . The university offer one hundred 1-credit hour PAIPs per academic semester . Considering pilot nature study , target PAIPs limited meeting follow inclusion criterion : 1 ) PAIP size 30 student generally show approximately equal gender distribution ; 2 ) PAIP delivers principle practice individually tailor habitual activity plan . The investigator randomly select 14 eligible PAIPs assign intervention ( k=7 ) control ( k=7 ) group . The outcome measure interest change objectively subjectively measured physical activity academic semester .
DOC.criteria: healthy college student enrol 1credit physical activity instruction program . wish participate ; currently use wearable activity tracker ; indicated major physical , psychiatric , cardiovascularrelated problem diagnose physician .
